headline: CarMax: Solid Execution, But I Still Have Lingering Concerns (Rating Upgrade To Hold)
summary: CarMax (KMX) stock is upgraded to hold after strong Q1 results. Solid sales growth driven by pricing strategy, but credit risks keep valuation range-bound. See more.

headline: CarMax price target raised to $81 from $80 at RBC Capital
summary: RBC Capital raised the firm’s price target on CarMax (KMX) to $81 from $80 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The company reported better than feared results, with notable upside surprises on used unit comps and gross profit, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm adds it is encouraged by the momentum, but remains somewhat cautious on the sustainability of the current comp trend given macro uncertainty. headline: Auto retail sector: Portfolio manager shares his top 2 picks
summary: Markets (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) have been volatile in 2025 as investors continue to watch tariffs, geopolitical risks, and inflation. Hennessy Focus Fund co-portfolio manager Brian Macauley joins Market Domination Overtime to explain why he's eyeing long-term opportunities in the auto retail sector, including CarMax (KMX) and O'Reilly (ORLY). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
